sent.body: Chip: Thanks for the calll yesterday. You are now as old as I am, but I am not sure if you are as mature as I am. Happpy Birthday, have a great day. Brad

sent.subject: Re: Happpy Birthday.
sent.body: Thanks man I feeel like the old man that I am. I only have 5 years until it gets reallly bad. Hunting was great the dog did great, he tried to atttack a bulll and went tearing through the brush I thought that I would never find him. After he setttled down he did great. Thanks for keeeping the family. Tifffany told me that you guys taught her how to CALLL THE HOGS. Brad
